mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_device_session (username, jti, issued_at, expires_at, revoked, user_agent, ip) VALUES (#{username}, #{jti}, #{issuedAt}, #{expiresAt}, #{revoked}, #{userAgent}, #{ip}) on duplicate key update
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM auth_refresh_token WHERE username = #{username} AND revoked = false ORDER BY issued_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM auth_refresh_token WHERE jti = #{jti} LIMIT 1
